contents:
用指环王试了试
Legolas and Gimli advanced on the orcs, raising their weapons with a harrowing war cry. They charged through the army, killing Men and Elvish warriors one by one, until the entire army was in bloody ruin. Despite the Black Riders mounting a counter-attack, the orc soldiers continued through the battlefield, slaying Elves as they went. At last the Black Riders broke the wall of orcs, who had barely entered the city. Though overwhelmed, the orcs refused to surrender and prepared to defend themselves, while the attackers made their way to Balin's Gate. They were stopped by many more orcs


粗看不明觉厉细看毫无逻辑，AI毕竟是有局限的，从和奇幻相关的语料中随机挑出一些然后组合在一起，能做到符合人类语法规则，但是不能理顺文字之间的逻辑关联。
当然，人日这种本身就不讲逻辑的文章和AI真是绝配。
